text: Dr. Sirikkaththuge Neville Arthur Fernando (9 March 1931 - 4 February 2021) was a Sri Lankan doctor and a politician. He was born in Panadura, Sri Lanka. He was a member of the Sri Lankan Parliament from 1977 to 1989. Fernando was a member of the United National Party. He founded the Neville Fernando Teaching Hospital. Fernando died at a hospital in Angoda, Sri Lanka of COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Sri Lanka. aged 89.Dr.Neville Fernando passes away from COVID-19 ==References== Category:2021 deaths Category:1931 births Category:Sri Lankan politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Sri Lanka
title: Neville Fernando
